roy0325 wrote:
> I am a newbie to Heritrix...Someone set it up for me a while ago and I
> just found this problem couple days ago and I couldn't find a solution,,
> 
> Heritrix version: 2.1 (I think it's 2.1 but not 100% sure)

There is no version 2.1. From the screenshot you'd posted on a JIRA 
issue, it looks like one of the 1.X versions... perhaps an outdated 
version, because the 'About' and 'Help' tabs are separate.

I recommend the 1.14.2 version for beginners.

> When I want to start collect from
> http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&rlz=1W1DKUS_en&q=site%3A.az+haqqinda+&btnG=Search
> 
> Once I select start crawling, it will pause and give me an Alert:
> "Serious error occured processing 'unknown'
> Associated Throwable: java.lang.StackOverflowError
> 
>   Stacktrace:
> java.lang.StackOverflowError
>      at jave.lang.abstractStringBuilder.append(Unknow Source)
>      at jave.lang.StringBuilder.append(Unknow Source)
>      at javax.management.Attribute.toString(Unknow Source)
> 
> and keep looping and looping....
> --------------------------------------

After updating to 1.14.2, if you still get the error, please provide the 
complete error shown. (You've trimmed off even parts that were in your 
screenshot.) Also describe all changes from the default configuration 
you've applied.

- Gordon @ IA
